ygData.subject: Re: Where are the Minotaur Axes?
ygData.msgSnippet: There are almost always Mino Axes for sale in Butcherblock and Greater Feydark. I d try there. There is a Mino Cave in the Steamfont mountains that supplies
ygData.messageBody:
There are almost always Mino Axes for sale in Butcherblock and Greater
Feydark. I'd try there. There is a Mino Cave in the Steamfont mountains
that supplies most of the Mino Axes on the Bertoxx server


On Fri, 28 May 1999, David Nolle wrote:

> From: David Nolle <dnolle@...>
>
> Hello,
> I'm a sixth level Paladin running solo around Freeport. Can anybody tell
> me where you get the Minotaur Axes I keep hearing about? With my limited
> funds, it seems like I'll be stuck with a rusty scimitar or sword for life!
> Thanks!
>
> PS Call this a Quest, it is for me!
>
> Dave Nolle <dnolle@...>
> aka Pendor - Defender of Light!
